About Me

Download My CV
Find Me Online
  • LinkedIn
  • Twitter

Are you someone who shares my passion for building thriving communities and making a positive impact on the world around us?


Hi, I am Akash Agrawal, A Community Builder by passion and profession.


Let me introduce myself. In 2015, I founded a business from scratch and successfully scaled it within a year. Following that, I transitioned to working as a graphic designer for four years before discovering my true calling in community building. Throughout my career, I have successfully crafted vibrant communities for diverse organizations, each with their own unique vision and purpose as part of the Community Folks team. I have been hosting online and offline events, including global events with Commsor.

I'm also a founding team member of a travel startup called "Travander." As part of the team, I helped develop a clear business model, design a go-to-market strategy, identify the right demographic, create a community strategy, and launch it with internal members.

But the truth is, community building has been a part of me all along. Even before I knew the formal terminology for it, I was creating successful gaming communities on Discord and expanding them over time by delegating responsibilities to other passionate users.

My ultimate goal is to bring together like-minded individuals and foster a strong sense of community, while also delivering significant business value.

I approach community building with a deep understanding of its transformative potential for businesses. I recognize that a thriving community is more than just a collection of individualsâ€”it is a catalyst for growth, customer loyalty, and brand advocacy. By prioritizing authentic engagement, fostering inclusivity, and cultivating a sense of belonging, I consistently deliver tangible results for the organizations I serve.

Helping others and bringing people together is what truly motivates me, and I'm always just a ping away! Oh, and did I mention that I'm also a huge animal lover with a soft spot for creatures big and small, whether they reside on land, in the mountains, or in the sea and sky?

According to me,

Community Builders are the Unsung Superheroes who donâ€™t wear capes.

A3Designers was a passion project to revolutionize the real estate and the construction industry. I started it with 2 friends and scaled it to an annual turnover of INR 5 Million in the launch year.

Freelance

Graphic Designer and Editor

I worked as a graphic designer for about 4 years. In this time I created various types of personalized graphics for my clients. I also built a community of my clients on Facebook.
